Description: Curved-topped limestone stela with sunk relief detail divided into two registers: Upper - Amasis offering to Neith and Horus of the North and South; winged sun-disc with pendent uraei above. Lower - Eight rows of Hieroglyphic text.
Curator's comments: Published: PM IV, p.48 Being studied as part of PhD by Elisabeth Greifenstein (University of Wuerzburg).
Associated names: Named in inscription & portrayed: Amasis (Ahmose II)
Named in inscription & portrayed: Horus of the North
Named in inscription & portrayed: Horus of the South
